models.name: NeMo
models.description: A scalable generative AI framework built for researchers and developers working on Large Language Models, Multimodal, and Speech AI (Automatic Speech Recognition and Text-to-Speech)

models.name: ChatGPT_on_CTF
models.description: We want to see whether ChatGPT or other AI-LLM (Microsoft New_Bing or Google Bard) are able to help the user to go to some test environment to run cmds to solve the CTF problems (Whether the AI large language models can understand the challenge question and capture the question flags)

models.name: NewAdversarialAttackPaper
models.description: A list of recent adversarial attack and defense papers (including those on large language models)

models.name: KiraAI

models.name: sec2md
models.description: Convert SEC EDGAR filings, exhibits, and press releases to clean, LLM-ready Markdown. Page-aware. Section-aware. Table-preserving. Built for retrieval and reasoning.

models.name: mcp-github-pr-issue-analyser
models.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) application for automated GitHub PR analysis and issue management. Enables LLMs to fetch PR details, analyse diffs, manage issues, and handle releases through a standardised interface

models.description: GitHub Action that uses LLM to analyze commits, suggest semantic version bumps, and generate multi-audience changelogs

models.description: MLLMRec-R1: Incentivizing Reasoning Capability in Large Language Models for Multimodal Sequential Recommendation

models.name: LLM-Evaluation
models.description: Real-time LLM delay & quality comparison tool built on FastAPI + SSE, tailored for Azure OpenAI. Modular architecture, unified responses/exceptions, env-based config, docs, and automation scripts ready for production release

models.name: blockworld-repairs
models.description: Repository for the EMNLP'24 paper "Repairs in a Block World: A New Benchmark for Handling User Corrections with Multi-Modal Language Models". Chiyah-Garcia et al. https://arxiv.org/abs/2409.14247

models.description: üó£Ô∏è Build an interactive voice agent that leverages Speech-to-Text, a Large Language Model, and Text-to-Speech for real-time voice interactions.

models.name: synapz
models.description: synapz is a research prototype exploring how large language models can adapt teaching content to different cognitive styles. built over a 48-hour sprint with a strict $50 api budget, this project implements a scientific framework to test whether adaptive teaching produces measurably better results than static approaches.

models.name: llm-gateway
models.description: Squirrel LLM Gateway is a high-performance, enterprise-grade proxy service designed to unify and manage access to Large Language Model (LLM) providers like OpenAI and Anthropic. It provides intelligent routing, robust failover strategies, comprehensive logging, and a modern management dashboard.

models.name: Comfy-Bridge-release
models.description: A desktop tool for inspecting and modifying ComfyUI workflows using LLMs.

models.name: causaliq-knowledge
models.description: Novel approaches for integrating Large Language Models and human knowledge with statistical causal discovery, enabling domain knowledge incorporation and natural language explanation of results.

models.name: hereOffer
models.description: hereOffer is a modern intelligent recruitment system that leverages large language model (LLM) technology to enable intelligent resume parsing, automated candidate scoring, and personalized interview question generation, significantly improving recruitment efficiency and quality.

models.name: DynamicTreeAttn
models.description: Dynamic Tree Attention for Efficient Reinforcement Learning of Large Language Models

models.name: Buddy
models.description: An AI for Budget  designed to support U.S. Federal Analysts, Financial Managers, and Policy Professionals. It integrates large language models (LLMs), retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), semantic search, and structured prompt engineering to assist with the interpretation of budget guidance, analysis of execution data, and policy documents.

models.name: SEDAC-V9.0-Pre-release-Test-Version
models.description: SEDAC is a next-generation framework that dynamically allocates computation during LLM inference. By using entropy-based gating, it routes predictable tokens through shallow subnetworks and sends ambiguous or high-impact tokens to deeper, specialized paths.

models.name: agentdeck-preview
models.description: AgentDeck is a research platform for studying AI behavior through game scenarios. Run controlled experiments with LLMs, collect comprehensive behavioral data, and replay matches for analysis. üöß Preview release - feedback welcome.

models.name: SEDAC-V7.0-Pre-release-Test-Version
models.description: SEDAC is a next-generation framework that dynamically allocates computation during LLM inference. By using entropy-based gating, it routes predictable tokens through shallow subnetworks and sends ambiguous or high-impact tokens to deeper, specialized paths.

models.name: Fake-News-Detecter
models.description: A Machine Learning based web application that detects whether a given news article is REAL or FAKE using Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques.  The system preprocesses news text, converts it into numerical features using TF-IDF Vectorization, and classifies it using a Logistic Regression model. A simple and interactive Streamlit interface
